meanings.definition: The action of introducing something again.
meanings.sent1: The zoo's reintroduction of the rare species was a success.
meanings.sent2: The reintroduction of the old tradition brought joy to the community.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show featured a hilarious skit about the reintroduction of disco dancing.
meanings.sent4: Her speech was a reintroduction to the values that once defined our nation.
meanings.sent5: The reintroduction of the classic song had everyone singing along.

meanings.definition: The act of bringing something back into existence or use.
meanings.sent1: The reintroduction of the vintage fashion trend was well-received.
meanings.sent2: The company's reintroduction of the popular product boosted sales.
meanings.sent3: The movie plot revolved around the unexpected reintroduction of a forgotten invention.
meanings.sent4: His return to the team was a reintroduction of talent and skill.
meanings.sent5: The garden's reintroduction of native plants enhanced its beauty.
